mapper.select: SELECT OM_CODE ,CM_CODE ,OM_PARENT_NO ,OM_NM ,OM_ORGNZT_SE ,(CASE WHEN OM_ORGNZT_SE='H' THEN '본사' WHEN OM_ORGNZT_SE='B' THEN '지점' ELSE '팀' END) AS OM_ORGNZT_SE_NM ,OM_SORT_ORDR ,OM_MEMO ,USE_AT ,DELETE_AT ,REGIST_MAN ,REGIST_DE ,UPDT_MAN ,UPDT_DE FROM tb_orgnzt_manage A WHERE DELETE_AT ='N' AND cm_code = #{cm_code} AND OM_ORGNZT_SE = IF(#{om_code}='' or #{om_code} is null, '1', OM_ORGNZT_SE ) AND (OM_CODE = IF(#{om_code}='' or #{om_code} is null, OM_CODE, #{om_code}) or OM_PARENT_NO = IF(#{om_code}='' or #{om_code} is null, OM_PARENT_NO, #{om_code}) ) ORDER BY OM_ORGNZT_SE, OM_SORT_ORDR

SELECT OM_CODE ,CM_CODE ,OM_PARENT_NO ,OM_NM ,OM_ORGNZT_SE ,OM_SORT_ORDR ,OM_MEMO ,USE_AT ,DELETE_AT ,REGIST_MAN ,REGIST_DE ,UPDT_MAN ,UPDT_DE FROM tb_orgnzt_manage A WHERE OM_ORGNZT_SE = '1' AND CM_CODE = #{cm_code} AND USE_AT='Y' AND DELETE_AT='N' ORDER BY OM_SORT_ORDR, OM_NM

SELECT OM_CODE ,CM_CODE ,OM_PARENT_NO ,OM_NM ,OM_ORGNZT_SE ,OM_SORT_ORDR ,OM_MEMO ,USE_AT ,DELETE_AT ,REGIST_MAN ,REGIST_DE ,UPDT_MAN ,UPDT_DE ,(SELECT B.OM_PARENT_NO FROM TB_ORGNZT_MANAGE B WHERE B.OM_CODE = A.OM_PARENT_NO) AS UP_DEPTH_CODE ,om_zipcd ,om_adres ,om_dtadres ,om_etcadres ,om_la ,om_lo FROM tb_orgnzt_manage A WHERE OM_CODE = #{om_code}
SELECT M_PARENT_NO, (SELECT M_NM FROM TB_MENU B WHERE B.M_NO=A.M_PARENT_NO) AS M_PARENT_NAME FROM tb_menu A WHERE M_NO = #{m_no} LIMIT 1
SELECT m_no FROM tb_menu WHERE m_no != 1 AND m_nm != 'HOME' LIMIT 1
SELECT M_NO, M_NM FROM TB_MENU WHERE M_NO <> 1 AND M_PARENT_NO IS NULL ORDER BY M_ORDER
SELECT m_no, m_nm FROM tb_menu a WHERE m_parent_no = #{m_no} and (select count(*) from tb_menu b where b.m_parent_no = a.m_no) > 0 ORDER bY m_order
SELECT om_code, om_nm FROM tb_orgnzt_manage WHERE cm_code = #{cm_code} AND om_orgnzt_se='B' AND use_at ='Y' AND delete_at ='N' ORDER BY om_sort_ordr
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_orgnzt_manage SET DELETE_AT = 'Y' ,UPDT_MAN = #{updt_man} ,UPDT_DE = NOW() WHERE OM_CODE=#{om_code}
